author: Scott Polacek
title: NHL Reportedly Considering North Dakota Among Options to Resume Season
description: The  NHL  is reportedly considering finishing the rest of its season in North Dakota when play returns following the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Minas Panagiotakis/Getty Images
The NHL is reportedly considering finishing the rest of its season in North Dakota when play returns following the coronavirus pandemic.
According to Elliotte Friedman of Sportsnet, the league and its players association have… [+2023 chars]
